com.helger.schematron.pure.validation

Class AbstractPSPartialValidationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.schematron.pure.validation.PSValidationHandlerDefault
      • com.helger.schematron.pure.validation.AbstractPSPartialValidationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPSValidationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PSValidationHandlerBreakOnFirstError, PSValidationHandlerBreakOnFirstFailedAssert

    @NotThreadSafe
public abstract class AbstractPSPartialValidationHandler
extends PSValidationHandlerDefault
    An extension of PSValidationHandlerDefault that is used to determine the overall validity of a Schematron validation. The final validation result can be retrieved by invoking getValidity().
    Author:
    Philip Helger

    • Method Detail

      • getValidity

        @Nonnull
public abstract com.helger.commons.state.EValidity getValidity()
        Returns:
        The validity of the XML file. EValidity.VALID if no failed assertion and no successful report occurred, EValidity.INVALID otherwise.
